title: Solstice - MP3 Discography (1992-2012)
description:
The first CD is a killer mix of thrash and death metal, Florida style, and it's simply awesome.

The second album drifts more towards the latter genre, sounding extremely similar to Malevolent Creation's "Stillborn" (even in the vocals department you can hear Brett Hoffmann's influence), but a lot better.

The third one, recorded after a long hiatus, is more straightforward death metal, but with bits of thrash sprinkled on it. All of them are great and should satisfy the needs of thrash/death enthusiasts.

The fourth is an interesting compilation. Both first albums remastered, and a 2011 remix of "Pray" (mind you, it's no techno bullshit - pure metal, but with freshly remixed sound). In short: one new version of the first CD and two versions of the second.


1. (1992) Solstice
2. (1995) Pray
3. (2009) To Dust
4. (2012) Pray For The Sentencing (Compilation)


Download it, enjoy, seed, and comment.
See ya!
